Package org.insa.graphs.model.io

Class BinaryGraphReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.insa.graphs.model.io.BinaryReader
      • org.insa.graphs.model.io.BinaryGraphReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, GraphReader
    public class BinaryGraphReader
extends BinaryReader
implements GraphReader
    Implementation of GraphReader to read graph in binary format.
